body.name: iClever Bluetooth Mouse, Wireless Dual Device Mouse with 5 Adjustable DPI, 6 Buttons, Rechargeable, Ergonomic Design for Laptop, iPad, MacBook, Tablet, PC
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 28 mins
features: Triple Connectivity & Multiple Compatibility: With dual Bluetooth modes and 2.4G wireless technology, the computer wireless mouse can connect up to 3 devices like Windows 7/8/10 computer, Mac / iMac / iPhone / iPad / tablet PC / Laptop / smartphone simultaneously. A single click of the Connect button on the side, you can freely switch between the 3 devices.

Ergonomic Design: Every details are elaborately crafted to fit your hand. The ergonomic mouse is built with a natural palm-grip outlook and extended thumb rest to give you the ultimate comfort without hand pain even after long time work!

Adjustable 5 DPI Settings: By choosing between 800 / 1200 / 1600 / 2000 / 2400 DPI, you'll always find the most proper sensitivity intuitively through blinking DPI indicator to fulfil your job efficiently with precise tracking and fluent movement. The Bluetooth mouse gives you fabulous stability and precise control over multimedia tasks.

USB-C Rechargeable: Built with 500mAh lithium battery, this ergonomic mouse can be recharged through reversible USB-C charging port for convenient wireless use anywhere. It supports plug-n-play, superior for internet surfers, games and office workers. In addition, the mouse is built with auto sleep function and power switch for extended battery life.

Whisper-quiet Operation: Get things done quietly without disturbing others! The wireless ergonomic mouse makes each click of the left and right keys, and scrolling of the mouse wheel precise and inaudible, which greatly improve your concentration, learning and productivity. Because of the Forward and Backward buttons, web browsing turns much smoother and quicker!
body.description: Enjoy Wireless Fun at Your Fingertips Smooth and comfortable experience, efficient wheel scrolling By connecting to your device through dual Bluetooth channels or 2.4GHz USB receiver, the wireless mouse supports connecting up to 3 devices simultaneously without delay and dropouts! With merely a press of the Connect button, you can freely switch between the 3 devices. No more need to replace batteries, the mouse can be recharged for convenient use anywhere and it supports plug-n-play for better productivity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Wireless Fun at Your Fingertips Smooth and comfortable experience, efficient wheel scrolling By connecting to your device through dual Bluetooth channels or 2.4GHz USB receiver, the wireless mouse supports connecting up to 3 devices simultaneously without delay and dropouts! With merely a press of the Connect button, you can freely switch between the 3 devices. No more need to replace batteries, the mouse can be recharged for convenient use anywhere and it supports plug-n-play for better productivity. Highlights Dual 2.4G + Bluetooth connection mode Triple connectivity Adjustable 5 DPI resolution Ergonomic design Vast compatibility USB-C rechargeable

2.4G + Dual Bluetooth Connection Plug and play. After connecting with your devices via 2.4G USB receiver or Bluetooth 3.0/5.0, you can switch between devices freely by clicking the Connection button on the side. Rechargeable 500mAh Battery Adopted the newest reversible USB-C charging port, the mouse can last for continuous 50 hours of use after 3-hour charging. Less charging and more doing. Adjustable DPI Adjustable 5-grade DPI resolution (800/1200/1600/2000/2400 DPI) gives more sensitivity than standard optical mouse for smooth and precise tracking and fast response without any cursor shaking.

Whisper-quiet & Durable Both the left and right keys are made for noiseless clicking, thus you don't have to worry about bothering others even in a library! Your productivity will be increased to a new level too. No matter how many times you click a day, the rugged construction can withstand intense testing up to 5,000,000 clicks. Comfortable Use Hours at the computer can leave your hand aching and result in carpal tunnel syndrome. By imitating the arc shape of palm grips, the ergonomic mouse is perfect for daily use, no more strain on your fingers and wrist! Broad Compatibility The wireless mouse can connect up to 3 devices at the same time. Please use it confidently for Windows 7/8/10 computer, Mac/Mac/iPhone/iPad/Tablet /PC/Laptop/smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouse.
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed is how comfortable it is to hold. I have had several... mice? Anyway I've had a bunch of them and this one is very comfortable and ergonomic. The other thing I really love about it is how quiet it is. You don't get that click click feedback like every other stupid mouse. If you're into that kind of thing this probably isn't for you. Overall - would recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I really wanted to like this mouse
reviews.reviewText: This mouse seems to be very well constructed, and worked well with my Mac: silent buttons and scroll wheel, multiple device support, and rechargeable from a standard USB-C connector. The bluetooth connection to my Mac was solid, and I did not experience any disconnections in the week I was using it.I really wanted to keep this mouse, but after a few days, I realized that it was a bit too tall for me. With my arm resting on the desk, it was causing my wrist to be in an uncomfortable position, and the strain traveled all the way up to my shoulder, so I had to stop using it. I'm sure it would be a perfectly good mouse for many other folks though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good budget

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Updated: Nice mouse, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: The first one I got, the scroll wheel broke after a month (right outside of the return window). Customer service reached out and offered to replace the mouse anyway, and the scroll wheel seems to be fine on the new one. Thank you!The mouse is exactly what I was looking for. It's silent, and it's really smooth and comfortable. It's really high without being a vertical mouse, which is nice if you'd like some wrist relief but don't want to have your shoulder rotated like you need to with the vertical kind. Great alternative to some of the more expensive brand mice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do you work multiple job???
reviews.reviewText: This is a game changer! Works extremely well, easy set up, and allows quick movement to devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Formerly 4 stars now zero
reviews.reviewText: Center button that normally changes wheel from detent to smooth scrolling (they call it the DPI button here) doesn't appear to do anything. Instructions don't elaborate, only label it as such.Fits hand nicely, silent buttons are a nice feature.UPDATE: SCROLLWHEEL FAILED IN 12 DAYS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simplicity and comfort
reviews.reviewText: For this price, it’s great. Clicks are silent. Scroll wheel is smooth. Rechargeable. And no need for wires or batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy. No battery level in Windows 11 Bluetooth menu, though.
reviews.reviewText: The mouse is large, comfortable, and feels solid. Unfortunately, the battery level doesn't show in the Bluetooth menu in Windows 11 like other devices do. This was my only reason for buying a new mouse.
